name: Dogmole Tuppowski: The New Adventures
overview: Helps Dogmole to get the 15 stolen idols, and return them to the altar to appease the wrath of Vah-ka. But be careful, it's not going to be easy!. The 20 witches with their arcane arts have obstructed access to the altar. To be able to access it, you must eliminate them all before. As if that were not enough, the idols were distributed throughout the area, and on top, have protected with their henchmen invoked from the underworld!. Minotaurs and living skeletons put things difficult for you to take away the precious idols.Note that to be so heavy, you can only carry one at a time to the altar. Finally some advice... not be hasty in your actions. It is essential to take it slow, study the movements of the enemy and act at the right time. Only then you will get the victory!.
